channel.title: Hi I'm Chris, a wannabe Freelancer and Bootstrapper in College
channel.description:
I'm a student at FAU. I'm insanely busy with basically anything I think is interested. I envy not being in college only because of the focus on what you're doing. I also do enjoy the variety of people and even the craziness of the whole experience.
I want to get my self going with a good freelancing business as well as launch my new website http://realday.co which is still in heavy alpha stage. It's being created with Bootstrap, Laravel, and jQuery :grin:
I'm excited to be part of a community like this and learn more about bootstrapping a (couple) business(es). :wink:
